content: Bank Account Investments Asked by Ng Ze Wei Asked on 06 Mar 2019Does it make sense to buy into all three banks (DBS/UOB/OCBC) for long term gains? ?1 answerAnswerBump1
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Terence Tan, Finance at Singapore Management UniversityLevel 3. WonderkidAnswered on 06 Mar 2019There is no point buying all 3 banks - You might as well buy STI ETF. Do note that STI ETF is heavy on banks as well.If you want, choose 1. But if you want to choose 1, it must be at the right price.0 comments0
